trans-unit.source: Provides methods to place data on and retrieve data from the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 提供將資料放置於系統，以及從系統剪貼簿擷取資料的方法。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: For a list of predefined formats to use with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class.
trans-unit.target: 取得一份預先定義的格式，以便使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>類別。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A> to put data on the Clipboard, replacing its current contents.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>將資料放在剪貼簿，並取代它目前的內容。

trans-unit.source: To place a persistent copy of the data on the Clipboard, set the `copy` parameter to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要將永續性資料的複本放到剪貼簿上，設定`copy`參數`true`。

trans-unit.source: To place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class or an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 若要將資料放在剪貼簿以多種格式，使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>類別或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>實作。

trans-unit.source: Place data on the Clipboard in multiple formats to maximize the possibility that a target application, whose format requirements you might not know, can successfully retrieve the data.
trans-unit.target: 將資料放在剪貼簿以多種格式目標應用程式，您可能不知道其格式需求可以成功地擷取資料的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A> to retrieve data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A>從剪貼簿擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The data is returned as an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface.
trans-unit.target: 資料以實作的物件傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>介面。

trans-unit.source: Use the methods specified by <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> and fields in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> to extract the data from the object.
trans-unit.target: 使用所指定的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>中的欄位和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>從物件擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: If you do not know the format of the data you retrieved, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface to get a list of all formats that data is stored in.
trans-unit.target: 如果您不知道您所擷取之資料的格式，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetFormats%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>介面，以取得的所有格式清單，該資料會儲存在。

trans-unit.source: Then call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface, and specify a format that your application can use.
trans-unit.target: 然後呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject.GetData%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>介面，並指定您的應用程式可以使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class provides additional methods that make it easier to work with the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別會提供額外的方法可讓您更輕鬆地使用系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.Clear%2A> method to remove all data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.Clear%2A>方法，以從剪貼簿移除所有資料。

trans-unit.source: To add data of a particular format to the Clipboard, replacing the existing data, call the appropriate `Set`*Format* method, such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>, or call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A> method to specify the format.
trans-unit.target: 若要新增的特定格式的資料到剪貼簿，並取代現有的資料，呼叫適當`Set`*格式*方法，例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>，或呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A>方法，以指定格式。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve data of a particular format from the Clipboard, first call the appropriate `Contains`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>) method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format, and then call the appropriate `Get`*Format* method (such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>) to retrieve the data if the Clipboard contains it.
trans-unit.target: 若要從剪貼簿擷取的特定格式的資料，請先呼叫適當`Contains`*格式*方法 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>) 方法，以判斷剪貼簿是否包含資料的格式，然後再呼叫適當`Get`*格式*方法 (例如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>) 來擷取資料，如果剪貼簿包含它。

trans-unit.source: To specify the format in these operations, call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A> methods instead.
trans-unit.target: 若要在這些作業中指定的格式，呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A>方法改為。

trans-unit.source: All Windows-based applications share the system Clipboard, so the contents are subject to change when you switch to another application.
trans-unit.target: 所有的 Windows 應用程式共用系統剪貼簿，因此當您切換到另一個應用程式內容可能會變動。

trans-unit.source: An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a non-serializable object to a Clipboard method, the method will fail without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將不可序列化的物件傳遞至剪貼簿方法時，該方法會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>如需詳細資訊，在序列化。

trans-unit.source: If your target application requires a very specific data format, the headers added to the data in the serialization process may prevent the application from recognizing your data.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的目標應用程式需要非常特定的資料格式，標頭加入至資料的序列化處理序可能會禁止應用程式無法辨識您的資料。

trans-unit.source: To preserve your data format, add your data as a <xref:System.Byte> array to a <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> and pass the <xref:System.IO.MemoryStream> to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要保留您的資料格式，將加入資料做為<xref:System.Byte>陣列<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>並傳遞<xref:System.IO.MemoryStream>至<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject.SetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Special considerations may be necessary when using the metafile format with the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用剪貼簿的中繼檔格式時，可能需要特殊考量。

trans-unit.source: Due to a limitation in the current implementation of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject> class, the metafile format used by the .NET Framework may not be recognized by applications that use an older metafile format.
trans-unit.target: 因為在目前的實作限制<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataObject>類別，.NET Framework 所使用的中繼檔格式可能無法辨識的應用程式使用較舊的中繼檔格式。

trans-unit.source: In this case, you must interoperate with the Win32 Clipboard application programming interfaces (APIs).
trans-unit.target: 在此情況下，您必須與 Win32 剪貼簿應用程式開發介面 (Api) 的互通。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see article 323530, "Metafiles on Clipboard Are Not Visible to All Applications," in the Microsoft Knowledge Base at http://support.microsoft.com.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 323530，"中繼檔上剪貼簿是不可見到所有應用程式 」 在 Microsoft 知識庫文件在http://support.microsoft.com。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>將資料放在與擷取系統剪貼簿的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已建立並放置在表單上。

trans-unit.source: The `button1_Click` method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A> to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: `button1_Click`方法呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>取自文字方塊中選取的文字，並將它放在系統剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: The `button2_Click` method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A> to retrieve data from the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: `button2_Click`方法呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A>從系統 剪貼簿擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The code uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> to extract the data returned and displays the data in `textBox2`.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>擷取傳回的資料，並顯示在資料`textBox2`。

trans-unit.source: Removes all data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿中移除所有資料。

trans-unit.source: Because the Clipboard is shared by multiple processes, calling this method may have an impact on those processes.
trans-unit.target: 因為剪貼簿共用多個處理序，呼叫這個方法可能會影響對這些處理序。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for clearing the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 清除系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.OwnClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.OwnClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether there is data on the Clipboard in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿上是否有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.WaveAudio" /> 格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is audio data on the Clipboard; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿上有音訊資料，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains audio data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetAudioStream%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含音訊資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetAudioStream%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: The format of the data to look for.
trans-unit.target: 要尋找的資料格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 如需預先定義的格式，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" />。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether there is data on the Clipboard that is in the specified format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿上是否有指定格式的資料，或是可以轉換為該格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is data on the Clipboard that is in the specified <paramref name="format" /> or can be converted to that format; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿上有指定 <paramref name="format" /> 的資料，或是可轉換為該格式的資料，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> class contains pre-defined format names that you can use with this method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>類別包含預先定義的格式名稱，您可以使用這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含指定的格式或相容的格式中的資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetData%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether there is data on the Clipboard that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿上是否有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> 格式的資料，或是可以轉換為該格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is a file drop list on the Clipboard; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿上有檔案下拉清單，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的下拉式清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains a file drop list before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含檔案下拉式清單，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether there is data on the Clipboard that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿上是否有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> 格式的資料，或是可以轉換為該格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is image data on the Clipboard; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿上有影像資料，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains image data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetImage%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含影像資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetImage%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.

trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether there is text data on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿上是否有文字資料。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether there is data on the Clipboard in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format, depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 指出剪貼簿上是否有 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> 格式的資料，格式依作業系統而定。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if there is text data on the Clipboard; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿上有文字資料，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method checks for the presence of data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText> format on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會檢查資料是否存在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText>於格式化[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method checks for the presence of data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text> format.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法會檢查狀態中的資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text>格式。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether the Clipboard contains text data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含文字資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetAudio%2A>方法，將音訊資料到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: The format of the data to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: 要擷取的資料格式。

trans-unit.source: See <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" /> for predefined formats.
trans-unit.target: 如需預先定義的格式，請參閱 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats" />。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the Clipboard in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿擷取指定格式的資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> representing the Clipboard data or <see langword="null" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the specified <paramref name="format" /> or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿不包含任何指定 <paramref name="format" /> 或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為代表剪貼簿資料或 <see langword="null" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in the specified format or a compatible format before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsData%2A>方法，以判斷剪貼簿是否包含指定的格式或相容的格式中的資料，然後再擷取以這個方法。

trans-unit.source: If this method cannot find data in the specified format, it attempts to convert the data to the format.
trans-unit.target: 如果這個方法在指定的格式中找不到資料，它會嘗試將資料轉換成的格式。

trans-unit.source: If the data cannot be converted to the specified format, or if the data was stored with automatic conversion set to `false`, this method returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料無法轉換成指定的格式，或是儲存資料時自動轉換設定為`false`，這個方法會傳回`null`。

trans-unit.source: Data can be converted to another format if it was stored specifying that conversion is allowed, and if the requested format is compatible with the stored format.
trans-unit.target: 資料可以轉換成其他格式，如果儲存時指定，允許轉換，而且要求的格式與預存格式相容。

trans-unit.source: For example, data stored as Unicode can be converted to text.
trans-unit.target: 例如，資料儲存為 Unicode 可以轉換成文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A> method to add data to the Clipboard in a particular format.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetData%2A>方法將資料加入到剪貼簿中的特定格式。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the data that is currently on the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 擷取目前在系統剪貼簿中的資料。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" /> that represents the data currently on the Clipboard, or <see langword="null" /> if there is no data on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject" />，表示目前在剪貼簿中的資料，或者如果剪貼簿中沒有資料，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Because the data type of the object returned from the Clipboard can vary, this method returns the data in an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回從剪貼簿的物件的資料型別可能會不同，因為這個方法會傳回中的資料<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>。

trans-unit.source: Then you can use methods of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> interface to extract the data in its proper data type.
trans-unit.target: 然後您可以使用的方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>介面，以擷取其適當的資料型別中的資料。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to get the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> if all attempts are unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試十倍在 100 毫秒的間隔時間，取得資料，並擲回<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>如果所有嘗試都失敗。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> methods to place data on and retrieve it from the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>將資料放在與擷取系統剪貼簿的方法。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been placed on the form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`放置在表單上。

trans-unit.source: The `button1_Click` method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A> to take selected text from the text box and place it on the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: `button1_Click`方法呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>取自文字方塊中選取的文字，並將它放在系統剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: The `button2_Click` method calls <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A> to retrieve data from the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: `button2_Click`方法呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetDataObject%2A>從系統 剪貼簿擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: The code uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats> to extract the data returned.
trans-unit.target: 程式碼會使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.IDataObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats>擷取傳回的資料。

trans-unit.source: The data is displayed in `textBox2`.
trans-unit.target: 資料會顯示在`textBox2`。

trans-unit.source: Data could not be retrieved from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 無法從剪貼簿擷取資料。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode and the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Application.MessageLoop" /> property value is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行緒不處於單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式，而且 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.Application.MessageLoop" /> 屬性值為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a collection of file names from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿擷取檔名稱的集合。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> containing file names or <see langword="null" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿不包含任何 <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> 格式或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為包含檔案名稱或 <see langword="null" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" />。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的下拉式清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is stored on the Clipboard as a <xref:System.String> array.
trans-unit.target: 檔案下拉清單儲存在剪貼簿上<xref:System.String>陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method converts this array to a <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection> and returns the collection.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將此陣列與<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection>，並傳回集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains a file drop list before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A>方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含檔案下拉式清單，然後再擷取以這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetFileDropList%2A> method to add a file drop list to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetFileDropList%2A>方法，將檔案拖放清單到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates this member.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會示範這個成員。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: for access to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 用於存取系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: Retrieves an image from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿擷取影像。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> representing the Clipboard image data or <see langword="null" /> if the Clipboard does not contain any data that is in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" /> format or can be converted to that format.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿不包含任何 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Image" /> 格式或可以轉換為該格式的資料，則為代表剪貼簿影像資料或 <see langword="null" /> 的 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.Bitmap" />。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsImage%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains image data before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsImage%2A>方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含影像資料，然後再擷取以這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetImage%2A> method to add image data to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetImage%2A>方法，將映像資料到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves text data from the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿擷取文字資料。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves text data from the Clipboard in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format, depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 從剪貼簿擷取 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> 格式的文字資料，格式依作業系統而定。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard text data or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> if the Clipboard does not contain data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format, depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 如果剪貼簿不包含 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> 格式 (依作業系統而定) 的文字資料，則為剪貼簿文字資料或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns text data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText> format on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回文字資料的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText>於格式化[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns text data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text> format.
trans-unit.target: 否則，這個方法會傳回文字資料的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text>格式。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains text data before retrieving it with this method.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含文字資料，然後再擷取以這個方法。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A> method to add text data to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>方法將文字資料加入到剪貼簿。

trans-unit.target: 清除剪貼簿，然後將資料加入其中。

trans-unit.source: The data to place on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要放置到剪貼簿上的資料。

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then places nonpersistent data on it.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪貼簿，然後將非永續性資料置於其中。

trans-unit.source: Data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式結束時，資料將從系統 剪貼簿中刪除。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> if all attempts are unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試設定十倍 100 毫秒間隔中的資料，並擲回<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>如果所有嘗試都失敗。

trans-unit.source: An object must be serializable for it to be put on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將不可序列化的物件傳遞至這個方法時，它將會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>如需詳細資訊，在序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example uses <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A> to place nonpersistent text data onto the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetDataObject%2A>將放入系統剪貼簿的非保存的文字資料。

trans-unit.source: In the `button1_Click` method, the selected text is copied from `textBox1` and pasted on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 在`button1_Click`方法，從複製選取的文字`textBox1`並貼上剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: In the `button2_Click` method, the information is retrieved from the Clipboard and displayed in `textBox2`.
trans-unit.target: 在`button2_Click`方法時，資訊會從剪貼簿擷取並顯示在`textBox2`。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `button1`, `button2`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設`button1`， `button2`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已建立並在表單上。

trans-unit.source: Data could not be placed on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 資料無法放置到剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="data" /> 的值是 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: for adding data of any type or format to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 任何類型或格式的資料加入至系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: The data to place on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要放置到剪貼簿上的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you want data to remain on the Clipboard after this application exits; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要在這個應用程式結束之後，將資料保留在剪貼簿上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then places data on it and specifies whether the data should remain after the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 清除 [剪貼簿]，然後將資料放置在 [剪貼簿] 上，並指定在應用程式結束之後，是否應保留資料。

trans-unit.source: If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 如果`copy`參數是`false`，應用程式結束時，會從系統 剪貼簿刪除資料。

trans-unit.source: This method attempts to set the data ten times in 100-millisecond intervals, and throws an <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException> if all attempts are unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會嘗試設定十倍 100 毫秒間隔中的資料，並擲回<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ExternalException>如果所有嘗試都失敗。

trans-unit.target: 物件必須可序列化，才能放在剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.source: If you pass a non-serializable object to this method, it will fail without throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將不可序列化的物件傳遞至這個方法時，它將會失敗而不擲回例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization> for more information on serialization.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization>如需詳細資訊，在序列化。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following method is run in an application.
trans-unit.target: 應用程式中執行下列的方法。

trans-unit.source: It places a persistent copy of the selected text data in the text box on the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 就會將選取的文字資料永續性複本系統剪貼簿上的文字方塊中。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `button1`, `textBox1`, and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設`button1`， `textBox1`，和`textBox2`已建立並在表單上。

trans-unit.source: In a different application, the following method retrieves the text from the system Clipboard and pastes the text into `textBox2`.
trans-unit.target: 在不同的應用程式中，下列方法系統剪貼簿中擷取文字並貼到文字`textBox2`。

trans-unit.source: This code assumes `button2` and `textBox2` have been created and placed on a form.
trans-unit.target: 此程式碼假設`button2`和`textBox2`已建立並在表單上。

trans-unit.source: Data could not be placed on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 資料無法放置到剪貼簿上。

trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.AllClipboard" />

trans-unit.target: 要放置到剪貼簿上的資料。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if you want data to remain on the Clipboard after this application exits; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果您要在這個應用程式結束之後，將資料保留在剪貼簿上，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The number of times to attempt placing the data on the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將資料放置於剪貼簿上的次數。

trans-unit.source: The number of milliseconds to pause between attempts.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試之間暫停的毫秒數。

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then attempts to place data on it the specified number of times and with the specified delay between attempts, optionally leaving the data on the Clipboard after the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 清除 [剪貼簿]，然後嘗試以指定的次數將資料放置於 [剪貼簿] 上，而且在兩次嘗試之間採用指定的延遲，同時可以選擇在應用程式結束以後，將資料保留在 [剪貼簿] 上。

trans-unit.source: Adding data to the Clipboard can occasionally fail if the Clipboard is busy with another thread or application.
trans-unit.target: 將資料加入至剪貼簿偶爾會失敗如果剪貼簿正忙碌於另一個執行緒或應用程式。

trans-unit.source: This method is useful to work around this issue in environments with heavy Clipboard use.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相當實用，若要解決此問題在環境中經常使用剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: If the `copy` parameter is `false`, the data will be deleted from system Clipboard when the application exits.
trans-unit.target: 如果`copy`參數是`false`，應用程式結束時，會從系統 剪貼簿刪除資料。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" /> containing the file names.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection" />，其中包含檔案名稱。

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then adds a collection of file names in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> format.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪貼簿，然後加入 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.DataFormats.FileDrop" /> 格式的檔案名稱集合。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is a collection of strings containing path information for files.
trans-unit.target: 檔案的下拉式清單是包含檔案的路徑資訊的字串集合。

trans-unit.source: A file drop list is stored on the Clipboard as a <xref:System.String> array.
trans-unit.target: 檔案下拉清單儲存在剪貼簿上<xref:System.String>陣列。

trans-unit.source: This method converts `filePaths` to a <xref:System.String> array before adding it to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會將轉換`filePaths`至<xref:System.String>才能將它新增到剪貼簿的陣列。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve a file drop list from the Clipboard, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains data in that format before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從剪貼簿擷取檔案的下拉式清單，請先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsFileDropList%2A>方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含以該格式的資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetFileDropList%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

At least one of the strings in <paramref name="filePaths" /> is <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />, contains only white space, contains one or more invalid characters as defined by <see cref="F:System.IO.Path.InvalidPathChars" />, is <see langword="null" />, contains a colon (:), or exceeds the system-defined maximum length.

trans-unit.target: 清除剪貼簿，然後將文字資料加入其中。

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the Clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then adds text data in the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> format, depending on the operating system.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪貼簿，然後依作業系統而定加入 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText" /> 格式的文字資料。

trans-unit.source: This method adds text data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText> format on [!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將文字資料的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.UnicodeText>於格式化[!INCLUDE[WinXpFamily](~/includes/winxpfamily-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[Win2kFamily](~/includes/win2kfamily-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method adds text data in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text> format.
trans-unit.target: 否則，此方法會將文字資料的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat.Text>格式。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve text data from the Clipboard, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains text data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從剪貼簿擷取文字資料，請先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含文字資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard> class can only be used in threads set to single thread apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard>類別只可以用於設定為單一執行緒 apartment (STA) 模式的執行緒。

trans-unit.source: To use this class, ensure that your `Main` method is marked with the <xref:System.STAThreadAttribute> attribute.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an overload of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A> method that is similar to this overload.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範的多載<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.SetText%2A>類似於這個多載的方法。

trans-unit.source: The Clipboard could not be cleared.
trans-unit.target: 無法清除剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: This typically occurs when the Clipboard is being used by another process.
trans-unit.target: 這通常在剪貼簿由另一個處理序使用時發生。

trans-unit.source: The current thread is not in single-threaded apartment (STA) mode.
trans-unit.target: 目前執行緒 (Thread) 不是在單一執行緒 Apartment (STA) 模式。

trans-unit.source: Add the <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> to your application's <see langword="Main" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.STAThreadAttribute" /> 加入至應用程式的 <see langword="Main" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> is <see langword="null" /> or <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="text" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: for adding text data to the system Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 將文字資料加入至系統剪貼簿。

trans-unit.source: Associated enumeration: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.OwnClipboard" />
trans-unit.target: 相關聯的列舉型別： <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.UIPermissionClipboard.OwnClipboard" />

trans-unit.source: The text to add to the Clipboard.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至剪貼簿的文字。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Clears the Clipboard and then adds text data in the format indicated by the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 清除剪貼簿，然後加入指定之 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.TextDataFormat" /> 值所表示格式的文字資料。

trans-unit.source: To retrieve text data from the Clipboard, first use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A> method to determine whether the Clipboard contains text data before retrieving it with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要從剪貼簿擷取文字資料，請先使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.ContainsText%2A>方法來判斷剪貼簿是否包含文字資料，然後再擷取它與<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Clipboard.GetText%2A>方法。

trans-unit.target: 若要使用這個類別，請確認您`Main`方法標示為<xref:System.STAThreadAttribute>屬性。
